name: E-Motion (itch)
description:
E-Motion

> Short and Fun 2D Shooter Puzzle Game :D

> HOW TO PLAY: 

     ⋙ Venture through the map solving puzzles to get into the next area

     ⋙ Defeat enemies

     ⋙ Pressure plates can be found around the map and need to have weight on                 them to open a door. 

     ⋙  Use Brain cells

____________________________________________________________

HINT: If you ever find yourself lost or confused 

             ➥  Option ONE: Retrace your steps

             ➥ Option TWO: Think of the opposite

             ➥ Option THREE: Use your brain ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
